jei.potionsplus.particle_emitter.descrip: Emits particles in an area around itself when powered by redstone. Interact with an empty hand to cycle through different particles. Interact with a dirt block, iron ingot, gold ingot, or diamond to set the particle spawn rate to 1x (default), 2x, 3x, 4x, respectively.
jei.potionsplus.decorative_fire.descript: Ablaze in all ways but truly, this curious stasis makes for the ideal fireplace.
jei.potionsplus.lava_geyser.description: Yowch! Try attaching it to a Particle Emitter.
block.potionsplus.uranium_ore.not_expose: Some sulfuric acid might loosen this up...
tooltip.potionsplus.skill.journal.none: Level up skills to unlock abilities here!

description.potionsplus.ability.nether_w: +Nether Wart May Drop Nether Wart Blocks
block.potionsplus.hanging_fern.descripti: A fern that hangs from the ceiling. It's a little bit like a fern, but it's hanging.
block.potionsplus.survivor_stick.descrip: This stick is a survivor. It's been through a lot, but it's still here.
block.potionsplus.dandelion_versatile.de: Can be placed on any block face.
Can be placed on any block face.

block.potionsplus.red_mushroom_versatile: Can be placed on any block face.

block.potionsplus.sunflower_versatile.de: Can be placed on any block face.
block.potionsplus.lilac_versatile.descri: Can be placed on any block face.

block.potionsplus.large_fern_versatile.d: Can be placed on any block face.
block.potionsplus.pitcher_plant_versatil: Can be placed on any block face.
jei.potionsplus.brewing_cauldron.descrip: Use blaze powder on a vanilla cauldron filled with water to transform it into a brewing cauldron. A heat source must be placed directly beneath in order to brew. The brewing cauldron is the heart of Potions Plus, and allows the player to craft all vanilla brewing stand recipes, in addition to being the exclusive way to craft Potions Plus potions. Recipes for all these potions are randomized per world. The Herbalist's Lectern, Abyssal Trove, and Sanguine Altar provide essential functions for deducing these recipes.
jei.potionsplus.herbalists_lectern.descr: The Herbalist's Lectern is a block that can provide information about an inserted item's usage in brewing cauldron recipes.
jei.potionsplus.sanguine_altar.descripti: The Sanguine Altar will show the player another brewing cauldron ingredient of the same tier as the inserted ingredient. Missing an ingredient in the Trove? The Sanguine Altar will help identify it. Be warned, the Sanguine Altar hungers for blood and consumes all items it takes, permanently.
jei.potionsplus.abyssal_trove.descriptio: The Abyssal Trove is an indispensable tool in any alchemist's journey. It holds the information of all known potion brewing ingredients. This block is purely informational, but one that a young brewer will surely rely on to unearth the secrets of potion-making.
jei.potionsplus.clothesline.description: The Clothesline is a humble addition to any home. What is wet, shall become dry. Right-click two fence posts or walls with string to construct.
jei.potionsplus.moss.description: A pillow of moss that feels soft to the touch. Smells like dog, tastes like bog! Obtained by shearing mossy blocks.
jei.potionsplus.salt.description: Tangy, tasty, and a little bit toasty. A pinch of salt can go a long way. Never say Nether to water!
jei.potionsplus.wormroot.description: A twisting root that wriggles in your hand. A trick of the mind or a sign of life? May drop from rooted dirt or hanging roots.
jei.potionsplus.rotten_wormroot.descript: A wormroot that has seen better days. It's still good for something, right? Get some wormroot wet to rot it.
jei.potionsplus.lunar_berries.descriptio: A mystical berry that only blooms at night. A sweet berry's best friend! Maybe you can find them together after dark...
jei.potionsplus.wreath.description: A wreath of flowers strung together with metatarsals. Acts as a Totem of Undying while worn; a gift from God to you.
jei.potionsplus.netherite_remnant.descri: Amongst volcanic activity and crushing tectonic pressure, this netherite has been compacted into a dense chunk.
jei.potionsplus.raw_uranium.description: A chunk of raw uranium. It's a little warm to the touch, but it's not like it's going to explode or anything.
jei.potionsplus.uranium_ingot.descriptio: A refined ingot of uranium. It makes your hands tingle. Curious...
jei.potionsplus.sulfur_shard.description: A shard of sulfur. It stinks.
jei.potionsplus.sulfuric_acid.descriptio: A vile liquid that burns the skin. It's a little bit like lemon juice, but don't drink it.
item.potionsplus.filter_hopper_upgrade_a: Filter Hopper Upgrade: Allow Potion Ingredients
Filter Hopper Upgrade: Allow Edible Rewards
bait.potionsplus.gummy_worms.description: §dRare §7bait. High chance to attract cooler fish. §r§a++Avg. size§7, §r§c+Variance
bait.potionsplus.blazed_grub.description: Uncommon§7 bait. Found in Nether. §r§a+Avg. size§7, §r§a-Variance
jei.potionsplus.any_potion.description: This is a fake potion that represents any potion being eligible in a given recipe.
jei.potionsplus.any_other_potion.descrip: This is a fake potion that represents any potion other than the one being used in a given recipe.
jei.potionsplus.geode_grace.description: On death, effect-holders may replace nearby stones with ores.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.fall_of_the: Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.fall: Splash Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.f: Lingering Potion of Fall of the Void
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.fall_: Arrow of Fall of the Void
jei.potionsplus.fall_of_the_void.descrip: Saves the effect-holder from falling into the void.
jei.potionsplus.exploding.description: Mobs with this effect will explode shortly, breaking blocks. Players with this effect will explode shortly, without breaking blocks, and accelerate dramatically in the direction they are looking.
jei.potionsplus.magnetic.description: Nearby items are pulled towards the effect-holder.
jei.potionsplus.teleportation.descriptio: Randomly teleports the effect-holder to a nearby location.
jei.potionsplus.looting.description: Adds to the looting level while active. Stacks with the Looting enchantment.
jei.potionsplus.fortuitous_fate.descript: Adds to the fortune level while active. Stacks with the Fortune enchantment.
jei.potionsplus.metal_detecting.descript: Pings nearby ores. The higher the level, the more frequent the pings, and the greater the range. Detects copper, iron, gold, and ancient debris.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.reach_for_t: Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.reac: Splash Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.r: Lingering Potion of Reach for the Stars
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.reach: Arrow of Reach for the Stars
jei.potionsplus.nautical_nitro.descripti: Boats receive a +20% speed boost per level.
jei.potionsplus.crop_collector.descripti: Nearby crops are harvested when fully grown. Range and speed increase with effect level.
jei.potionsplus.botanical_boost.descript: Nearby crops grow faster. Higher levels increase the range and speed of growth.
jei.potionsplus.hunger.description: Makes the effect-holder super duper hungry.
jei.potionsplus.slip_n_slide.description: Affected mobs slide around like they're on ice. What fun!
jei.potionsplus.harrowing_hands.descript: Nearby skeletons become friendly and do not target players. Instead, they target other hostile mobs.
jei.potionsplus.shepherds_serenade.descr: All nearby passive mobs follow the affected player.
jei.potionsplus.soul_mate.description: Entities with the soul mate effect redirect a portion of healing and damage received to each other. Level 1 redirects 25%, level 2 redirects 50%, and level 3 redirects 75%.
jei.potionsplus.bouncing.description: Affected mobs bounce around like they're on a trampoline. What fun!
chat.potionsplus.acquired_ingredient_kno: You tingle with alchemical knowledge of the %s you possess...
The %s you possess reminds you of something wet and warm...
The %s you possess fills you with alchemical determination.
chat.potionsplus.brewing_cauldron_recipe: You have discovered the recipe for %s!
chat.potionsplus.duration_ingredient: This %s seems to stretch time... and potions.
advancements.potionsplus.brew_awkward_po: Use the Brewing Cauldron to brew an Awkward Potion.
advancements.potionsplus.dry_rotten_fles: Dry Rotten Flesh into Leather using the Clothesline.
advancements.potionsplus.brew_any_potion: Use the Brewing Cauldron to brew a potion with effects.
advancements.potionsplus.arid_cave.title: Arid Cave
advancements.potionsplus.ice_cave.title: Ice Cave
advancements.potionsplus.add_first_ingre: You found the trove and you gave it what you got.
advancements.potionsplus.add_common_ingr: Store a common ingredient in an Abyssal Trove.
advancements.potionsplus.add_rare_ingred: Store a rare ingredient in an Abyssal Trove.
advancements.potionsplus.acquire_moss.de: Shear mossy stones to get moss.
advancements.potionsplus.acquire_salt.de: Evaporate water in the Nether to get salt.
advancements.potionsplus.acquire_rotten_: Leave wormroot to rot in water.
advancements.potionsplus.convert_item_in: Reveal a potion ingredient by sacrificing another ingredient and some blood.
effect.minecraft.geode_grace.tooltip: chance to turn nearby stone into ore upon death.
effect.potionsplus.ticking_area.tooltip_: Tries to %s a random crop every
effect.potionsplus.fall_of_the_void.tool: Taking void damage teleports mobs to the top of the world.
effect.potionsplus.soul_mate.tooltip_2: of incoming damage and healing with other Soul Mates.
alert.fish_tank.too_small: Not enough space! Add adjacent tanks.
jei.potionsplus.chicken_frenzy.descripti: Spawns chickens around the affected entity periodically. Higher levels spawn more chickens more frequently.
jei.potionsplus.backwards_day.descriptio: Reverses movement controls for affected players. Higher levels increase the reversal intensity.
jei.potionsplus.squeaky_voice.descriptio: Makes player sounds higher pitched. Higher levels increase the pitch more dramatically.
jei.potionsplus.dizzy_spells.description: Causes random view rotation for affected players. Higher levels increase frequency and intensity.
jei.potionsplus.midas_touch.description: Turns touched blocks into gold temporarily. Higher levels increase range and duration.
